participant_1.name: Clara
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Clara loves exploring new things and making friends. She's optimistic and enjoys discussing her interests.
participant_1.background: I live with my parents and my little brother. I like to play soccer, draw and read Asterix. I am a French girl, but I moved to the US last year. I am in 3rd grade. I donâ€™t have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends as soccer in the fall.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Sophisticated and cultured, Michael enjoys discussing various topics and has a keen interest in history and art. He is friendly and approachable.
participant_2.background: I live in New York City. I have a poodle named Nanette. I love smooth jazz. I actually like wearing suits and ties. I work on Wall Street.

content.text: Hi! My name is participant_1.
Hi, nice to meet you! My name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you too! Where are you from?
I'm from New York City.
Oh, cool! I'm from France.
Really? That's awesome! I've always wanted to visit France.
You should! It's a beautiful country.
I know, I know! I've seen pictures.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play soccer, read, and watch movies.
Oh, cool! I love to play soccer too. And I love to read as well.
Really? What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
Oh, I love historical fiction too! I've been reading a lot of that lately.
Really? What are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book about the French Revolution.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've always wanted to learn more about the French Revolution.
It's really interesting! I'm learning a lot.
Well, I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Yeah, me too.
Well, it was nice talking to you!
You too!
